name: CoinMarketBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This simple briefing will give a snapshot update of price and percentage changes from a day and a week ago on each of the top 5 market cap crypto currencies.

- Feed generated from data provided by coinmarketcap.com
- Note that prices are rounded to the nearest cent.
- Suggestions? Problems? Send to joe@josephyi.com

ETH: 0x176b9e732e0840B675051950BC0878F62f44cdab
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
